desc.brif: Our Acne Treatment Package is designed to address the root causes of acne through a multi-faceted, personalized approach. Here’s what you can expect:

ul.liTitle: Consultation with expert – to prepare pathology and the complicated multi-faceted treatment
Full review of diet, lifestyle, and current face care routine (bring your products)
Complete package offering including based on the needs of the person – Price is $3,000 for the package value $3600:
subLi: Up to 2 products from our boutique

desc.brif: Our Hair Loss Package offers a thorough, personalized approach to help you address this issue effectively. Here's how we handle hair loss:

ul.liTitle: Consultation with Doctor Noemie Vezina – 1 of 8 doctors in Canada on the hair loss consensus will assess your needs
Medical assessment – scalp examination to determine the causes (hormonal, nutritional, stress, genetics, or other)

desc.brif: Our Pigmentation Package offers a personalized and comprehensive approach to address various types of pigmentation, ensuring you receive the most effective treatment for your specific needs. Here's how we handle pigmentation:

ul.liTitle: Consultation with expert – not all pigment are the same and it should not be treated as such ex. Melasma
Establish type of pigment (sunspot, melasma, age, or other)
Full review of current face care routine (bring your products)
Complete package offering including based on the person – Price is $4,750 for the package value $6,000:
subLi: Up to 2 Nano Laser Peel or Chemical Peel

desc.brif: At SABBYA, we offer a comprehensive solution to help you achieve smoother, younger-looking skin. Here’s how we handle wrinkles:

ul.liTitle: Complete package offering including based on the person – Price is 200 AD for the package value $5,100:
subLi: Up to 60 units of Botox or Dysport
Up to 2 HALO or 3 Morpheus 8 treatments
